title: MOOC Integration Design and Implementation in Campus Education

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary education curriculum and experience with fundamental digital learning tools
context.additional_context: A program for pre-service and in-service teachers integrating MOOCs with campus-based instruction to enhance learning motivation and acquisition of effective teaching methods. Requires content optimized for smartphone-based microlearning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more instructional design models integrating MOOCs and campus-based education.
Learners can analyze diverse motivational profiles (self-determination, grade-oriented, teacher trust) and develop personalized integrated strategies.
Learners can apply microlearning content design principles suitable for mobile environments to develop educational materials in social studies.

resources: Social Studies Microlearning Template with Curricular Alignment
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
